about_the_game:
Spiral is a third-person narratively driven exploration game sharing a poetic vision of cognitive degeneration seen from the inside.

In this demo, you will accompany Bernard as he explores his cabin, finding mementos that remind him of his life. This scene won't be in the final game and serves to give you an idea of what we aim to create with Spiral!

short_description: Spiral is a third-person narratively driven exploration game sharing a poetic vision of cognitive degeneration seen from the inside. It tells the story of Bernard, a man who wishes goodbye one last time to the memories that built him from his early childhood to who he is today.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, German, Russian, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
